function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of misinformation and false data due to lack of transparency in blockchain-based systems for healthcare management","Impact":"Increased risk of misdiagnosis, mistreatment, and widespread panic","Mitigation":"Implement strict validation processes for data entry and provide reliable sources for information","Technologies":"Blockchain validation protocols, AI-driven data analysis","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, public health authorities","Owner":"Technology developers, healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on 5G technology for real-time telemedicine consultations may lead to connectivity issues and disruptions in patient care","Impact":"Delayed or interrupted medical consultations, affecting patient care and treatment","Mitigation":"Develop backup communication systems for telemedicine, invest in network redundancy, and implement failover mechanisms","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms with offline functionality, redundant network infrastructure","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, telemedicine service providers","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, healthcare organizations, telemedicine service providers"},{"Description":"Dependence on 5G technology for healthcare data collection and analysis may result in privacy and security breaches","Impact":"Compromised patient data, privacy violations, and potential misuse of sensitive healthcare information","Mitigation":"Implement robust encryption standards, secure data transmission protocols, and regular security audits","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption, secure data transfer protocols","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data analysts","Owner":"Technology developers, healthcare organizations, data security experts"}]}
